amendment.description: Amendment prohibits Federal funding, fees, or resources from being used to consider or adjudicate any new, renewal, or previously denied application for any alien requesting consideration for deferred action.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-2 to provide that no funds may be used to consider new, renewal or previously denied DACA applications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 209 (Roll no. 30).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 209 (Roll no. 30).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
